# <a name="address-book-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="46321-102">Libreta de direcciones en Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46321-102">Address book in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46321-103">La libreta de direcciones de Outlook.com se llama personas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46321-103">Your Outlook.com address book is called People.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46321-104">Para ir a la página [personas](https://outlook.live.com/people/) , seleccione **contactos**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46321-104">To go to your [People](https://outlook.live.com/people/) page, select **People**</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="46321-105">en la esquina inferior de la página o en el selector de aplicaciones en la esquina superior de la página.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46321-105">at the bottom corner of the page, or from the app selector at the top corner of the page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="46321-106">Obtenga información sobre cómo [crear, ver y editar contactos en Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/5b909158-036e-4820-92f7-2a27f57b9f01?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="46321-106">Learn how to [Create, view, and edit contacts in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/5b909158-036e-4820-92f7-2a27f57b9f01?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
